item.title: Join the community chat
item.description: How to join the community chat The Open Terms Archive community concentrates interactions on an instant chat platform where every contributor and user is welcome. The following how-to guide will help you get into the community chat. 1. Create an account ðŸ”— Use this invitation link and create an account. After successful login, you will be automatically be added to the ~AnnouncementsÂ channel. 2. Profile setup ðŸ”— Once you’re all set, the next thing is to set up your profile.
